name: Dicethrower
description:
Controls:
Click and Hold LMB on the dice to charge up a roll.

Move your mouse in the target direction and release LMB to throw the dice. The dice will also be thrown when leaving the blue ring. The size of the ring is dependent on your last roll.

Press the Unstuck button, if your dice gets stuck somewhere.

Now try to overcome the obstacles and rolling challenges, or find your own way.

Have fun and feel free to share you final score :)
 #LowestScoreWins
